Question
========
  
The regression equation resulting from an experimental study, $\hat{y} = 16+3s+2g$ gives the relationship between y = performance, s = dummy sex (boy= 1) and g = dummy reward (well reward= 1). Johan is in the condition where there is reward; he has a performance of 18, how large is his residual $y-\hat{y}$? 
Answerlist
----------
* 3
* -3
* 1
* -1

* Incorrect
